steps: decided to have a nerf gun war
take nerf gun ammo out of the closet
take nerf guns out of the closet
pass out the nerf guns and ammo
collect the spent toys and put away

branching_info.option 1: only shoot at people in front of you
branching_info.option 2: shoot at anyone within a distance of 1,000 feet
freeform_ra: the nerf gun uses foam bullets and not real bullets
